original_title: Forbidden Knowledge: Legends of Atlantis Exposed
overview: The hunt for a long, lost world is raging with the search for Atlantis gaining momentum. Now, with new evidence for a great lost kingdom, some researchers claim they know where the long lost kingdom of Atlantis once was. Myth and legend tells of highly advanced, superior beings with vast armies in pre-history that were ultimately destroyed by a devastating cataclysm.
title: Forbidden Knowledge: Legends of Atlantis Exposed
